TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed CodeRegionMode extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the start or end of a code region.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following code example shows the use of the CodeRegionMode enumeration to specify the start of a region. This example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeRegionDirective> class.
[!code-vb[System.CodeDom.CodeDirectives#2](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.codedom.codereg_1_1.vb)] [!code-cs[System.CodeDom.CodeDirectives#2](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.codedom.codereg_1_1.cs)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.CodeDom.CodeRegionMode End = int32(2)
.field public static literal valuetype System.CodeDom.CodeRegionMode None = int32(0)
.field public static literal valuetype System.CodeDom.CodeRegionMode Start = int32(1)
